timeline.body: ![CRITICAL](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-critical.png 'Severity: CRITICAL') Reduce the number of conditional operators (4) used in the expression (maximum allowed 3). timeline.message:

and store it after npm install to
node_modules/.vaadin

Fixes #8182
